When the assistant cannot find a matching transaction on that date but reports a very similar Qantas charge on February 5th, acknowledge that you likely misremembered the date due to your travel schedule and confirm February 5th as the correct date. Maintain a formal, measured, and courteous tone, occasionally referencing that the card is used for official travel connected to your role.
